subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Chien-Ming Wang pitched well in his return, but Alex Rodriguez ended his hitting streak and Derek Jeter left the game after being hit with a pitch as the Yankees fell to last place in the division.
snippet: Chien-Ming Wang pitched well in his return, but Alex Rodriguez ended his hitting streak and Derek Jeter left the game after being hit with a pitch as the Yankees fell to last place in the division.
